strings.ARTIFACT_ENIGMA_NEW_DESCRIPTION: Your equipment changes every time it's activated. Additional Equipment become fragments that reduce cooldown.
strings.ITEM_ENIGMAFRAGMENTELITE_PICKUP: Gain a random elite powers upon equipment activation.
strings.ITEM_ENIGMAFRAGMENTELITE_DESC: Activating your Equipment gives you the <style=cIsDamage>power of a random elite</style> for <style=cIsDamage>75%</style> <style=cStack>(+75% per stack)</style> of the equipments cooldown.
strings.LOG_SOULS: Monster Logs: Lesser, Greater & Abundant Soul
